pr_title: HDDS-3673. Version information not printed correctly in SCM WebUI.

timeline.message: HDDS-3673. Version information not printed correctly in SCM WebUI.

timeline.bodyText:
Since the propertyhdds.version is also defined, I think this one should reference it instead of ozone.version.

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                <declared.hdds.version>${ozone.version}</declared.hdds.version>
          
          
            
                <declared.hdds.version>${hdds.version}</declared.hdds.version>
timeline.author: adoroszlai

timeline.message:
Use hdds.version instead of ozone.version

Co-authored-by: Doroszlai, Attila <6454655+adoroszlai@users.noreply.github.com>
